rules_text:
Shipwright 1 [i](When this enters, put a +1/+1 counter on it or a Vehicle you control.)[/i]
As long as you control a creature with flying, each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying. The same is true for agile, first strike, double strike, challenge, deathtouch, indestructible, lifelink, lure, menace, trample, and vigilance.
